Colors

Freshcart Furniture color design system can help you create a color theme that reflects your brand or style.

Theme Color

  • Preview
  • Code
Primary

#211f1c

Secondary

#dad7d2

Success

#16a34a

Danger

#dc2626

Warning

#eab308

Info

#0ea5e9

Light

#f6f5f4

Dark

#211f1c

$primary: $gray-900 !default;
														$secondary: $gray-200 !default;
														$success: $green !default;
														$info: $cyan !default;
														$warning: $yellow !default;
														$danger: $red !default;
														$light: $gray-100 !default;
														$dark: $gray-900 !default;

$gray-100: #ecebe9 !default;
														$gray-200: #dad7d2 !default;
														$gray-300: #c5c0b9 !default;
														$gray-400: #b3aca3 !default;
														$gray-500: #a0988d !default;
														$gray-600: #837a6d !default;
														$gray-700: #615b51 !default;
														$gray-800: #433e38 !default;
